posts.title: The Hands Free Umbrella Hat
posts.content: Stay dry without having to resort to uncomfortable ponchos or bulky umbrellas by slipping into the hands free umbrella hat. Available in 3 sizes, it features a collapsible cap, folds up for easy transport, and comes with 2 underarm straps that prevent it from flying away.

posts.title: Giant Tennis Ball
posts.content: Do we even need to elaborate here on why you need to buy this for your pup? It’s a giant tennis ball. Look at this friggin’ dog – he looks like he found his soulmate. Its got a 9.5″ circumference, so it’s a great gift for even the largest of breeds.

posts.title: Dry Erase Board Wall Paint
posts.content: Transform the walls in your home into canvases the kids can draw on using the dry erase board wall paint. This ingenious product is compatible with all dry erase markers and can be applied over many different kinds of surfaces for maximum versatility.

posts.title: Thor’s Hammer Meat Tenderizer
posts.content: Pound your meats with god-like fury by wielding this mini Mjolnir. Shaped like the Thunder God’s iconic weapon, it features a comfy silicone grip and sports an engraving that reads “whosoever holds this hammer, if they be worthy, shall possess the power of Thor!”.

posts.title: The 72 Hour Survival Kit Backpack
posts.content: Prolong your existence in any emergency situation by keeping this 72-hour survival kit backpack by your side. It features an air-tight construction and is packed with over 35 expertly curated survival tools designed for all types situations.

posts.title: The Rubik’s Cube For Idiots
posts.content: Give your simpleton brain a grueling workout by trying to solve the Rubik’s Cube for idiots. Aptly named the “boob cube”, this puzzle features a dumbed-down design that includes a solution manual just in case it proves too challenging.

posts.title: UNBORED Games
posts.content: Put your creativity skills to the ultimate test with the UNBORED games book. This entertaining book features more than seventy games ranging from old fashioned favorites to contemporary high tech games like croquet golf and capture the flag.

posts.title: Portable Nightlight Globes
posts.content: Light up the kid’s room with these night light globes or grab a single globe and use it as a light source. These portable nightlight globes are available in any color you like, and stay lit for thirty minutes before fading to darkness to ease any kid into falling asleep.

posts.title: The Night Dad Went To Jail Book
posts.content: Help little Timmy understand the concept of doing hard time by reading him “The Night Dad Went To Jail”. This informative children’s book will teach kids the life changes they can expect after daddy gets sent off to federal pound me in the ass prison.

posts.title: Backyard Ice Rink Kit
posts.content: Enjoy hours of skating without having to deal with the crowds using this backyard ice rink kit. The kit includes everything you’ll need to transform your plain yard into a cool 20 x 40 foot rink that all the neighborhood kids will be dying to skate on.

posts.title: LED Temperature Faucet Nozzle
posts.content: Instantly know the temperature of the water coming out of your faucet with this LED faucet nozzle attachment. Cold water turns the LED blue and hot water turns the LED red – making it perfect for avoiding third degree burns from faucets that spew hot lava.

posts.title: Craigslist Missed Connections Love Poems
posts.content: If love’s got you down, lift your spirits up with I Hope You Find Me: The Love Poems of Craigslist’s Missed Connections. Author Alan Feur has amassed hundreds of sweet, raunchy, and odd odes from Craigslist into some hilarious and sometimes heartbreaking poems.
